DOC.brief_summary: The study aim evaluate glycaemic insulinaemic response short-chain fructo-oligosaccharides ( scFOS ) use replace sugar ( e.g . dextrose ) food .
DOC.brief_title: Glycaemic Insulinaemic Responses After Consumption FOS .
DOC.criteria: Body mass index ( BMI ) 18.0 25.0 kg/m² ( include ) Ready keep volume physical activity dietary habit study particularly 24 hour visit Be use breakfast Nonsmoker least 3 month For female participant : pregnant breastfeed use efficient birth control Signed consent form Able follow instruction study Health insure Accepted include National Registry biomedical research Volunteers ( Fichier VRB , Volontaires Recherches Biomédicales ) . Fasting blood glucose 6.1 mmol/L ( 1.10 g/L ) ( diabetes treat ) Fasting blood cholesterol 6.35 mmol/L Fasting blood triglyceride 1.70 mmol/L ( history insulinoma ) Fasting blood insulin 20 mU/L Fasting HbA1c 7 % History hypercholesterolemia , hypertension , diabetes glucose intolerance treat History dietary allergy coeliac disease History digestive system disease susceptible modify digestion absorption like Crohn 's disease Somatic psychiatric disorder Renal insufficiency ( kidney failure ) SGOT ALAT 52.5 U/L Smoker Consuming 3 alcoholic beverage day Weight vary 3 kg last 3 month
